zadanie: 3.3 By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS, tuberculosis, malaria and neglected tropical diseases and combat hepatitis, water-borne diseases and other communicable diseases
definicja: The number of registered incidence of malaria.
wyjasnienia_metodologiczne: Malaria (diarrhea) is a parasitic disease transmitted by mosquitoes. The disease is manifested by regular recurrences of fever and chills. Data calculated on the basis of MZ-56 report on contagious diseases, infections and intoxication. According to the Tenth Revision of International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Health Problems ICD-10: a disease unit with the symbol B50.
zrodlo_danych: National Institute of Public Health – National Institute of Hygiene
